attributes.action: Extend Article 50, delay Brexit and hold a new referendum or a General Election.
attributes.background: The 2016 referendum was based on misinformation and the results were marginal (17m vs 16m and 13m abstentions). Progressing with Brexit without giving the public a further vote risks dangerous division in the country and economic disaster.
